title: President Trump Has Great Advice For Presidential Contenders
text:
It's too bad the media hates the president so much. He should be praised as one of the funniest guys to ever inhabit the office. On Thursday, ahead of the third 2020 Democratic presidential debate, President Donald J. Trump told his Democratic rivals that being president is "fun" and "easy." Know why? Because he makes all the decisions.

"A lot of people want the job. It's a great job. It's great because it's a lot of fun to work with Donald Trump and it's very easy actually to work with me. Know why it's easy? Because I make all the decisions and they don't have to work," Trump told the press pool.

President Trump - Fun and Easy ??

Because I make all the decisions and they don't have to work." pic.twitter.com/Httl7yMjfW — TrumpSoldier (@DaveNYviii) September 12, 2019

This is only his second funniest comment in recent months. In early August, the President hilariously said that "the only real winner here is Tlaib’s grandmother" after Rep. Rashida Tlaib refused to travel to Israel due to what she says is Israel's oppressive actions. Israel gave her permission to visit her grandmother, but the congresswoman declined for political reasons.
